testcase.name: Verify successful completion of an order purchase
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify successful completion of an order purchase Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.142s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.194s And User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.216s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.242s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.215s And User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.230s Then User clicks continue from checkout overview page ... passed in 1.200s When User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 1.202s Then Verify user should see the order confirmation page ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
